#include <iostream>

using namespace std;

int main()
{
    int n,m,i,j,k=0;
    char s[102][102], arr[102][102];
    
    for(i=0;i<102;++i)
    {
        for(j=0;j<102;++j)
        {   
            s[i][j]='.';
			arr[i][j]='.';
        }
    }
    
	cin>>n>>m;                                   
    while(n!=0 && m!=0)
    { 
                   ++k;
        for(i=0;i<102;++i)
        {
			for(j=0;j<102;++j)
			{   
				s[i][j]='.';
				arr[i][j]='.';
			}
		}
	    for(i=1;i<=n;++i)
		{
            cin>>s[i];
			s[i][m]='.';
        }
        
		for(i=1;i<=n;++i)
		{
            for(j=m;j>=1;--j)
            {
                s[i][j]=s[i][j-1];
			}
			s[i][0]='.';	
		}
        
		for(i=1;i<=n;++i)
        {
            for(j=1;j<=m;++j)
            {
                if(s[i][j]!='*')
                {
                    arr[i][j]=(char)(48 + (s[i-1][j-1]=='*') + (s[i-1][j]=='*') + (s[i-1][j+1]=='*') 
					                    + (s[i][j-1]=='*')   + (s[i][j]=='*')   + (s[i][j+1]=='*')
                                        + (s[i+1][j-1]=='*') + (s[i+1][j]=='*') + (s[i+1][j+1]=='*'));  
                }
				
       		    else
                arr[i][j]=s[i][j];
			}
		}
		
        cout<<"Field #"<<k<<":\n";		
		for(i=1;i<=n;++i)
		{
			for(j=1;j<=m;++j)
			{
				cout<<arr[i][j];
			}
			cout<<"\n";
		}
		cout<<"\n";
		cin>>n>>m;
	}
	
	return 0;
}
